.. _bob.db.replay:

======================================
 Replay-Attack Face Spoofing Database
======================================

.. todolist::

.. todo::
  Upload this documentation to PythonHosted

The `Replay-Attack Database <http://www.idiap.ch/dataset/replayattack>`_ for face spoofing consists of 1300 video clips of photo and video attack attempts to 50 clients, under different lighting conditions.
This database was produced at the `Idiap Research Institute <http://www.idiap.ch>`_, in Switzerland.

If you use this database in your publication, please cite the following paper on your references:

.. code-block:: latex

  @INPROCEEDINGS{Chingovska_BIOSIG-2012,
    author = {Chingovska, Ivana and Anjos, Andr\\'e and Marcel, S\\'ebastien},
    keywords = {biometric, Counter-Measures, Local Binary Patterns, Spoofing Attacks},
    month = september,
    title = {On the Effectiveness of Local Binary Patterns in Face Anti-spoofing},
    journal = {IEEE BIOSIG 2012},
    year = {2012},
  }
